about: I am a very determined, hardworking individual with an ability to solve problems and a skill to work with numbers obtained through a range of courses I had taken throughout the years. I am an alumnus of the Leaders' Quest programme offered by Life Choices, a part-time tutor at the IKamva Youth programme and currently enrolled to Life Choices Coding Academy for 12 months. As a result, I have been equipped with valuable experience in organising paperwork, administrating, leading, solving complex problems and mostly working with people through being a good communicator and a volunteer.My fascination with technology increased after I completed an information systems mandatory course at University of Cape Town.Through this, I am interested in enhancing my experience and skills professionally by securing a position in the service/tech industry..

education.detail: Matric exemption - Bachelor passes with 3 distinctions in Economics, Business Studies and Life Orientation.Top 10 of the best Business Studies and Economics Students in the Western Cape Province.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: I have  experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

skills.title: Leadership
skills.experience: I have completed a 2 year programme at Life Choice's Leaders' Quest, that has been carrying me since high school.

skills.title: Tutoring
skills.experience: One of my goals is to become a proffesor for something I specialize in , I have been a tutor since high school in commercial subjects and through IKamva Youth programme, I have been awarded with excellency and appreaciation of the impact I have on our yout and community

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.quotes: Natasha is a creative, and well-behaved individual who always prioritizes her work. She excels in collaborating with others and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap. Including Git and GitHub

testimonials.name: Ntokozo Sithebe
testimonials.quotes: In the time that I have known her, Natasha Kapeyi has proven herself to be exceptional at whatever she sets out to do, she has a strong aptitude for coding and a deep passion for learning and discovering new skills

testimonials.name: Heather Mtuedwa
testimonials.quotes: What makes Natasha Kapeyi different from the rest is her unwavering commitment to excellence approaching every project with a high level of professionalism and dedication. Her attention to detail and ability to work collaboratively makes her an invaluable member of any team

testimonials.name: Tashreeq Lee
testimonials.quotes: Natasha Kapeyi has great work ethic and is always willing to go the extra mile to ensure that the job is done right. She is a great problem solver and has an eye for detail that makes her stand out from the rest and also is highly organized, reliable, and always willing to lend a helping hand

testimonials.name: Andiswa Sinxo
testimonials.quotes: Natasha Zikhona is a very passionate and hard working person that I know. She is eager to learn new things to explore her knowledge. Solving problems and being a team player are part of her soft skills. Her journey of becoming a Software Developer proves the fact that she is a problem solver and she can outcome any challenges that she faces

testimonials.name: Chuma Tshaka
testimonials.quotes: Natasha is a hard-working student who shows commitment and dedication to her studies. Despite any hardships faced , she shows resilience and actively works towards her goals. This says a lot about her character and how she is able to bounce back from tough times
